Package dataframe

Interface IDataFrame

All Superinterfaces:
IComponent
All Known Implementing Classes:
CSV, JSON, TXT
public interface IDataFrame
extends IComponent
Common interface for dataframes in this project, most of the methods are implemented on table.Table.java.

    • sort

      Table sort​(java.lang.String columnName, java.util.Comparator<TableElement> comparator)
      Sorts the table by one column and a specific criteria. TableElementComparator inside the package table.element can be used as comp parameter.
      Specified by:
      sort in interface IComponent
      Parameters:
      columnName - column name (label)
      comparator - Comparator that implements a TableElement Comparator
      Returns:
      New sorted table

    • query

      Table query​(java.lang.String label, java.util.function.Predicate<TableElement> p)
      Filters the table elements by specific criteria. Predicates can be found inside table.element.TableElement class
      Specified by:
      query in interface IComponent
      Parameters:
      label - column name
      p - predicate that will be used to filter the table
      Returns:
      New filtered table
